other_tests.findings: Grew Enterobacter cloacae, Serratia marcescens, and Mycobacterium abscessus.

other_tests.date: After patient received treatment for M. abscessus infection at the third hospital
other_tests.findings: Multifocal abscesses with associated granulomatous inflammation, purulent necrosis, multifocal cystic bronchiectasis, dense chronic and acute inflammation, reactive squamous metaplasia, and regions of dense fibrosis with lymphoid aggregates and granulomas.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings are consistent with cystic fibrosis.

other_tests.findings: Chloride level of 40 to 45 mmol per liter.
Deletion of phenylalanine at amino acid position 508 (Phe508del) and substitution of aspartic acid for histidine at position 1152 (D1152H).
